error: Sorry, we've encountered an error, try again later.
empty_feed: No posts on this feed yet, come back later !

remove_item.title: Do you want to delete this ?
remove_item.content: Deleting is permanent and cannot be undo

archive_user.title: Do you want to archive this user?
archive_user.content: Archiving an user will hide it in some features

archive_user.title: Do you want to unarchive this user?
archive_user.content: Unarchiving an user will make it visible in features

archive_group.title: Do you want to archive this group?
archive_group.content: Archiving a group will hide it and nobody will be able to post on it

archive_group.title: Do you want to unarchive this group?
archive_group.content: Unarchiving a group will make it visible again

update_item.title: Do you want to save this modifications?
update_item.content: Editing an item cannot be undo
